page.title: 12Village Sports.
page.content:
There are several sports played in the village -football, cricket, snooker and pigeon racing. The{football club have 2 teams playing in the Plymouth and District League. They use the village playing field.The{cricket club also use this field.In 1984 they were champions of the Launceston League. The{Youth Football Club}have a field in St Ive Road. They have 3 teams, under 11's , 12's and 14's, playing in the Devon Junior and Minor League. The {snooker club}have two sides playing at the Village Hall. They have been very successful for the last 3 years . The {Pigeon Club}has about 20 members .The club has crates to keep the pigeons in for the weekly races. They are sent on a lorry to the place where they are let out. The first 5 home win prizes.
{ Martin David Firth. Jason Keith Apps.
